entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming west 20 this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
